entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
